Message: Today I am feeling tired and I am not in the mood to train.

It's completely natural to have off days, but let's try to focus on how much your body needs rejuvenation after this short session. Together, we'll take it easy, and I'll closely monitor your progress to ensure a positive experience. Remember, every effort counts, even if it
Today is a good day, but I dont think that I will manage to train for marathon as I would like to.

Regarding your goals, consistency is key, and we should celebrate small victories along the way. Even if today falls a bit short of expectations, we can still work on building endurance, technique, or speed in other aspects of training. Let's make the most of our time together and keep pushing forward,
Today I am sad and I dont know if training could help me get better.

Emotions ebb and flow, and sometimes they don't align with what our bodies need physically. However, physical activity often has a remarkable ability to uplift our spirits. If you feel up to it, let's give it a try, and I'll be here to support you every step
